entries.title: Galaxy S23 pricing likely won’t change in the US, but may go up everywhere else
entries.description: The leak also may have revealed pricing for Germany and Benelux.

entries.title: Google may rollout new Fast Pair feature when the Galaxy S23 launches
entries.description: The feature may make it easier to set up your next phone.

entries.title: DOJ files lawsuit against Google for having a digital ad monopoly
entries.description: The DOJ is joined by eight states.

entries.title: Roborock’s Dyad Pro is a smart vac and mop without robot prices
entries.description: It's not perfect, but it's a fraction of the cost of equivalent robot vacs.

entries.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 5: Everything we know so far
entries.description: The Galaxy Z Fold 5 rumor mill is already in overdrive.

entries.title: Samsung may bump up the brightness to 1750 nits on all Galaxy S23 models
entries.description: This would make the base model about 250 nits brighter than its predecessor.

entries.title: Google Pixels have one photography weakness, and it isn’t their camera
entries.description: From camera grips to dive cases and beyond, we'd love to see more camera-focused Pixel accessories.

entries.title: Poll: Which smartphone button placement do you prefer?
entries.description: Do you prefer the power button below the volume keys or on the other side entirely?

entries.title: Garmin announces a new reason to get your heart set on a Venu 2 Plus
entries.description: Keep an eye on your beats with Garmin's top smartwatch.

entries.title: These leaked S23 Ultra night mode shots suggest a big improvement
entries.description: There are still plenty of questions to be answered, but it tentatively looks like a major upgrade.

entries.title: Daily Authority: 👀 Bye-bye sideloading (sort of)
entries.description: Plus Samsung's other Ultra device, Dead Space's alternate ending, gaming fish, and more of today's top tech news.

entries.title: Amazon killed off book purchases via Kindle app: Here are some solutions
entries.description: Amazon has disabled book purchases via the Kindle app, but there are a few workarounds you can use.

entries.title: Someone fitted a Pixel 5a battery into a Pixel 4a for 17% extra battery life
entries.description: A hack best left to those who know what they're doing.

entries.title: Google Messages could finally get this staple messaging feature
entries.description: User profiles have been a thing in IM apps for years now, and it looks like Google will adopt it for Messages.

entries.title: Android 14 could block app sideloading to some extent
entries.description: Apps targeting older Android versions will be completely blocked.

entries.title: OnePlus 11 India price leaks: A better deal than OnePlus 10T?
entries.description: The OnePlus 11's price for India may have leaked, but how does it compare to the OnePlus 10T launch pricing?
